branchCategory.name: G
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC offers a variety of pressure gauges including general purpose, oil-free/external parts copper-free with limit indicator, clean series and a pressure gauge with a pressure switch.  Pressure ranges vary from 0 to 1.5MPa, depending on the selected gauge.  Panel mounting is possible.</P>

branchItem.name: G, Pressure Gauge for General Purpose (O.D. 15, 26)
branchItem.description: <p>SMC offers a variety of pressure gauges including general purpose, oil-free/external parts copper-free with limit indicator, clean series and a pressure gauge with a pressure switch.  Pressure ranges vary from 0 to 1.5MPa, depending on the selected gauge.</p>

branchItem.name: G(A)36, Pressure Gauge for General Purpose (O.D. 37)
branchItem.description: <p>SMC offers a variety of pressure gauges including general purpose, oil-free/external parts copper-free with limit indicator, clean series and a pressure gauge with a pressure switch.  Pressure ranges vary from 0 to 1.5MPa, depending on the selected gauge.</p>

branchItem.name: G36-L/G46-L/G53-L/G63-L, Pressure Gauge w/Limit Indicator, Color Zone Type
branchItem.description: <p>With the color zone limit indicator, users can set up the gauge for quick, "at a glance" indication of the appropriate operating pressure.  Adjustable red rings indicate low or excessive pressure while a needle in the green zone indicates appropriate pressure for the operation.  Pressure ranges vary from 0 to 1 MPa.</p>
